DOC.brief_summary: Up 40 healthy subject 2 site , age 30-65 year old Fitzpatrick-Elastosis score 3-6 mild moderate age/sun-related facial pigmentation wish improve facial skin appearance . Hypothesis : The SST improve appearance wrinkles/elastosis and/or pigmentation least 1 FES scale ≥50 % category scale 3 month follow-ups least 50 % study population .
DOC.brief_title: Impact M22 Synergistic Sequential Treatment ( SST )
